BadgeDetail.Name: Positive Attitude
BadgeDetail.Description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated how their positive attitude at and to work helps them and others succeed on projects and achieve shared goals.They approach work with enthusiasm, energy and a sense of humour. They are easy to work alongside and are able to positively adapt to a variety of situations.They are sensitive to the people around them and can match their enthusiasm to their environment.

Task.Title: Sunny side up
Task.Body: Provide an example of how you have demonstrated your positive attitude. This could be in or outside a work environment. You may like to say what others say about you.
